Name: BiliaryAnastomosisTypeCS
Title: Type of surgical biliary anastomosis CodeSystem
Description: Types of biliary anastomosis used in liver transplantation.

Name: BioSampleTissueTypeCS
Title: BioSample Tissue Type CodeSystem
Description: Tissue types for biological samples (from the bio_sample table).

Name: ConcomitantDiseaseCategory
Title: Concomitant Disease Category
Description: Categories of relevant concomitant diseases.

Name: ConcomitantMedicationCategory
Title: Concomitant Medication Category
Description: Categories of concomitant medications.

Name: DonorLiverTypeCS
Title: Donor Liver Type CodeSystem
Description: Type of liver donation (complete vs partial).

Name: DonorPreKtxDialysisTypeCS
Title: Donor Pre-KTX Dialysis Type CodeSystem
Description: Dialysis type used for the donor prior to kidney transplantation.

Name: ImmunosuppressantDrugTypeCS
Title: Immunosuppressant Drug Type
Description: Types of immunosuppressive drugs used in the transplant setting.

Name: ImmunosuppressiveInductionDoseUnitCS
Title: Immunosuppressant Induction Dose Unit
Description: Units for immunosuppressant induction dose.

Name: ImmunosuppressiveMaintenanceTypeCS
Title: Immunosuppressive Maintenance to Patient Type CodeSystem
Description: Type of immunosuppressive maintenance record.

Name: InstrumentalInvestigationNameCS
Title: Instrumental Investigation Name
Description: Types of instrumental investigation tests conducted.

Name: IntraoperativeComplicationCS
Title: Intraoperative Complications CodeSystem
Description: Intraoperative complications during liver transplantation.

Name: KidneySideCS
Title: Kidney Side CodeSystem
Description: Side of the kidney for nephrectomy / transplant context.

Name: LabResultUnitCS
Title: Lab Result Unit CodeSystem
Description: Units of measurement used for laboratory results, aligned with the lab_result unit conceptual domain.

Name: LabTestNameCS
Title: Lab Test Name
Description: Types of laboratory tests conducted.

Name: OutcomeTypeNameCS
Title: Outcome Type Name
Description: Types of clinical outcomes after transplant.

Name: PatientABOGroupCS
Title: Patient ABO Group CodeSystem
Description: ABO blood groups for transplant recipients (maps from OMOP A/B/AB/0).

Name: PatientHLAClassICS
Title: Patient HLA Class I Loci CodeSystem
Description: Class I HLA loci relevant to transplant matching.

Name: PatientHLAClassIICS
Title: Patient HLA Class II Loci CodeSystem
Description: Class II HLA loci relevant to transplant matching.

Name: PatientInstrumentalInvestigationResultCS
Title: Patient Instrumental Investigation Result CodeSystem
Description: Result of the instrumental investigation test conducted (Normal / Abnormal).

Name: PatientRhFactorCS
Title: Patient Rh Factor CodeSystem
Description: Rh factor of the transplant recipient (maps from OMOP Positive/Negative).

Name: PostEventTypeNameCS
Title: Post Event Type Name
Description: Types of post-transplant events.

Name: PreMedicationAntihypertensiveDrugCS
Title: Pre-medication Antihypertensive Drug CodeSystem
Description: Antihypertensive drugs used as pre-transplant medication.

Name: PreMedicationTypeCS
Title: Pre-medication Type CodeSystem
Description: Type of pre-transplant medication record.

Name: ReferenceGenomeBuildCS
Title: Reference Genome Build CodeSystem
Description: Reference genome build names.

Name: TransplantTypeCS
Title: Transplant Type CodeSystem
Description: Type of solid-organ transplant (liver, kidney, combined liver-kidney).

Name: VisitTypeCS
Title: Visit Type CodeSystem
Description: Type of visit in the transplant follow-up schedule.
